[[Bob]] (ex-boyfriend) }} '''Angela Delveccio''' was a girlfriend of [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]. Joey dated her in the period just prior to the show's timeline. In "[[The One With The East German Laundry Detergent]]", Joey meets a former girlfriend named Angela and tries to get her back. Her last name is not mentioned, she may or may not be the same Angela Delveccio. She was portrayed by [[Kim Gillingham]]. == Character == Throughout the series, Angela Delveccio is mentioned three times. Chandler tells Joey that their kitchen table was fine until his "little breakfast adventure" with her."[[The One With The Dozen Lasagnas]]" A few years later Chandler asks Joey what he gave Angela for birthday presents. Joey responds that she didn't have a birthday while they were going out, to which Chandler replies "For three years?""[[The One With The Dirty Girl]]" This proves that they had a long-term relationship. Joey runs into Angela at [[Central Perk]], where she reveals herself to be dating a man named [[Bob]]. Joey proposes that he and [[Monica Geller|Monica]] go on a double date, intending to break up Angela and Bob and take Angela for himself"[[The One With The East German Laundry Detergent]]". Though it's not officially stated that Angela Delveccio is the same one we see onscreen in "[[The One With The East German Laundry Detergent]]", there is no evidence that it is not her. Even though Joey dates a lot of women, it seems unlikely that he would have two ex-girlfriends named Angela within the span of a few months. At the end of "[[The One With The East German Laundry Detergent]]", Joey and Angela get back together, but probably split up again soon afterward, as she is never seen in the series again. == Trivia == * Angela grew up in Brooklyn Heights. * She and Joey dated for 3 years before the series started. == References == [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Season 1 Characters]] [[Category:One Appearance Only]] [[Category:Joey's relationships]] [[Category:Females]] [[Category:Characters]]
